---
title: "project-tracker"
---

A clearly defined/managed project typically requires the following data to be tracked: 

- project definition
  - a description of the project, its goals and a brief
- project team
  - client and delivery team responsible for completing the project against its brief
- budget
  - an predictive estimation of resources / spend required to deliver the project
- spend
  - a record of resources / spend actually used in the the delivery of the project
- milestones
  - time-periods to deliver the project and key dates during its delivery
